InstructionData.Title: MAIN_POWER_BACKUP_CONTROLLER
InstructionData.Author: D4RK GH0ST
InstructionData.Instructions:
#alias GENERATOR d0 #alias DISPLAY d1
alias BatteriesLevel r10 alias GeneratorState r11 #alias DisplayColor r12
# Small Batteries #define BatteriesHash -400115994 # Large Batteries define BatteriesHash -1388288459 define GeneratorsHash 813146305 define MinBatteryLevel 0.1 define MaxBatteryLevel 0.95
define Generators HASH("SAS Generator") define Batteries HASH("SAS Battery")
#define DisplayMode 1 #define FullColor 0 #define NormalColor 2 #define MidColor 5 #define LowColor 3 #define CriticalColor 4
main: # Carrega a media da porcentagem das baterias lbn BatteriesLevel BatteriesHash Batteries Ratio Average s db Setting BatteriesLevel
# Verifica o nivel das baterias e troca as cores do display de acordo # CriticalColor (Red) -> 0 to 0.2 sgt r0 BatteriesLevel 0 slt r1 BatteriesLevel 0.2 and r2 r0 r1 breqz r2 2 # move DisplayColor CriticalColor # jal setDisplay
# LowColor (Orange) -> 0.2 to 0.5 sgt r0 BatteriesLevel 0.2 slt r1 BatteriesLevel 0.5 and r2 r0 r1 breqz r2 2 # move DisplayColor LowColor # jal setDisplay
# MidColor (Yellow) -> 0.5 to 0.75 sgt r0 BatteriesLevel 0.5 slt r1 BatteriesLevel 0.75 and r2 r0 r1 breqz r2 2 # move DisplayColor MidColor # jal setDisplay
# NormalColor (Green) -> 0.75 to 0.95 sgt r0 BatteriesLevel 0.75 slt r1 BatteriesLevel 0.95 and r2 r0 r1 breqz r2 2 # move DisplayColor NormalColor # jal setDisplay
# FullColor (Blue) -> 0.95 to 1 sgt r0 BatteriesLevel 0.95 slt r1 BatteriesLevel 1 and r2 r0 r1 breqz r2 2 # move DisplayColor FullColor # jal setDisplay
# Verifica se o nivel das baterias esta abaixo do minimo blt BatteriesLevel MinBatteryLevel turnOnGenerator
# Verifica se o nivel das baterias esta acima do maximo bgt BatteriesLevel MaxBatteryLevel turnOffGenerator j main # Volta para o inicio
turnOnGenerator: # Liga o gerador move GeneratorState 1 sbn GeneratorsHash Generators On GeneratorState j main # Volta para o inicio
turnOffGenerator: # Desliga o gerador move GeneratorState 0 sbn GeneratorsHash Generators On GeneratorState j main # Volta para o inicio
#setDisplay: # s DISPLAY Mode DisplayMode # s DISPLAY Color DisplayColor # s DISPLAY Setting BatteriesLevel #j ra
